description: Avatar documentation for endoscopy findings records.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FINDING_POINT_AVATAR_C_NAME
columns.description:
The avatar type category ID for the finding.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Adult Male


Adult Female


Adult Neutral


Oropharynx


Adult Hands


Adult Feet


Male Genitalia


Female Genitalia


Adult Head


Child Neutral


Standard Colon


Standard Upper GI Tract


EUS


ERCP


Pulm


Left Hemicolectomy


Right Hemicolectomy


Sigmoid Colectomy


Colostomy


J-Pouch


Sigmoidoscopy


Billroth I


Billroth II


Roux-en-Y Gastric Bypass 


Nissen Fundoplication


Sleeve Gastrectomy


Lower EUS 


Remote Client

columns.name: FINDING_POINT_REGION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the anatomical region (VEL) this point is associated with.

columns.name: FINDING_POINT_LOCATION
columns.description: The exact x/y location of the point in the format "x,y", with x and y as decimals.

columns.name: FINDING_POINT_LAYER
columns.description: The layer on the avatar where this point exists.
